note: The climate in the community changed after Hitler's attack on Russia, June 21st. A compromise was effected in the situation in The Day, and the previous publishers took it over. Dr. S. Margoshes and A. Glantz-Lcycless led the majority. B. Z. Goldberg headed the minority.
